order_in_checkout_process: There is an order in the payment process.
order_not_for_checkout: There is no order to process the payment.
not_account_identified: Identification is required to perform the operation.
offer_conditions_change_on_add: The product's sales conditions have changed. It cannot be added to the cart. There may be no more units available.
cart_add_balance_mismatch: Error deducting points from your account.
product_not_in_order_error: The product is not in the cart.
cart_with_gift_cards: The cart already contains a gift card. You cannot add more than one card per purchase.
cart_is_not_empty: The cart must be empty to purchase a gift card.
cart_confirm_question: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
cart_unload_question: Are you sure you want to empty the cart?
product_not_in_stock: The selected product is out of stock.
check_no_stock: During payment, a product ran out of stock
catalog_dallow_adding: The catalog does not allow adding the item to the cart
one_voucher_cart: It is not possible to add more than one voucher to the cart
cp_requires_user_data: User data is required for the coupon
gc_requires_user_data: User data is required for the gift card
vo_requires_user_data: User data is required for voucher nomination
no_pin_stock: There is no stock of pins available for the voucher
context_error_adding_item: Error clearing the context when adding the item
context_error_calculating_shipment: Error clearing the context when calculating the shipping cost
no_item_for_prod: There is no item for the product
item_qty_exceeds_items: The specified quantity exceeds the total number of items
cart_doesnt_exist: The cart does not exist to empty
virtual_product_update_failed: A virtual product cannot be updated
insufficient_points_for_item: The item cannot be updated, insufficient points
itemless_cart: There are no items in the cart
courier_not_found: The courier service is not found in the catalog
point_inconsistencies: Inconsistencies when deducting points from the wallet. Order not confirmed
error_movingto_payment_conf: Error moving the order to 'Waiting for payment confirmation'.

confirm.giftcard_non_existent: The :name card is not available at the moment.

gift.recipient_message: Write your message or dedication here...

address.confirmation: Please confirm your shipping address and contact details.

giftcard_url_empty: Not available for activation on the web.
giftcard_redeem_before_use: For security reasons, we ask that you activate this Gift Card only when you are ready to use it and not before.
coupon_redeem_before_use: For security reasons, we ask that you activate this coupon only when you are ready to use it and not before.
courier_general_error: Error with the courier service website.
max_products: You can only have one voucher in the cart.
no_payment_info: No payment information available at this time.
